attributes.action: Ban schools from putting strict uniform laws in place.
attributes.additional_details: Many times transgender men have been made to wear skirts and transgender women have been made to wear pants. This could be very hard for someone to do as it could make them feel like they cant express who they are. As for hair, some schools require boys to have short hair and girls to have long hair, this could also be really damaging for a trans person.
attributes.background: Ban schools from strict uniform rules. Aswell as boundaries on hair and appearance. e.g: colour and style/length.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban school uniforms in English schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607158

Require schools to make uniform optional: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608259

Ban schools from setting rules about personal appearance of students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611540
